response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $140. This is a fantastic opportunity to experience the quality and benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to its usual value of $150. I trust it will meet your expectations and contribute positively to your needs. Please let me know if this offer suits you.", "product_price": 140}
